flow.speaker: AI
flow.text: Provide last 4 digits of savings account.

flow.speaker: User
flow.text: Can you show me my last 5 transactions?

flow.speaker: AI
flow.text:
Here are your most recent 5 transactions from checking:

  Starbucks – $6.45 (Sep 9)
  Uber – $15.20 (Sep 8)
  Amazon – $42.99 (Sep 7)
  Payroll Deposit – $2,500.00 (Sep 7)
  Netflix – $15.99 (Sep 6)

  Would you like me to download a statement for this month?

flow.speaker: AI
flow.text: Done. I’ve sent your September statement to your registered email.

flow.speaker: AI
flow.text: Confirm $200 transfer from checking 1234 to savings 4321?

flow.speaker: AI
flow.text: Please provide the last 4 digits of the card.

flow.speaker: User
flow.text: I want a personal loan for $10,000.

flow.speaker: User
flow.text: I see a charge I didn’t make.

flow.speaker: AI
flow.text: Charge flagged, fraud case opened, card locked.
